original: 2.3.2. Atītavāra🔽Yo rūpakkhandhaṁ parijānittha so vedanākkhandhaṁ parijānitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: atītavāra  yaḥ rūpa kkhandham parijānittha saḥ vedanā kkhandham parijānittha ati āmantā
translated: … The past section🔽Have those who fully understand the form aggregate also fully understood the feeling aggregate? Yes.

original: Yo vā pana vedanākkhandhaṁ parijānittha so rūpakkhandhaṁ parijānitthāti? Āmantā.🔽Yo rūpakkhandhaṁ na parijānittha so vedanākkhandhaṁ na parijānitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana vedanā kkhandham parijānittha saḥ rūpa kkhandham parijānittha ati āmantā  yaḥ rūpa kkhandham na parijānittha saḥ vedanā kkhandham na parijānittha ati āmantā
translated: Or do those who have fully understood the feeling aggregate also fully understand the form aggregate? Yes.🔽Have those who have not fully understood the form aggregate also not fully understood the feeling aggregate? Yes.

original: Yo vā pana vedanākkhandhaṁ na parijānittha so rūpakkhandhaṁ na parijānitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana vedanā kkhandham na parijānittha saḥ rūpa kkhandham na parijānittha ati āmantā
translated: Or do those who have not fully understood the feeling aggregate also not fully understand the form aggregate? Yes.
